content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-11.5, 25.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Boiler at position (-11.5, 25.0)
- Offshore pump at position (-9.5, 24.5)
- Steam engine at position (-11.5, 18.5)

### Copper plate factory at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (0, 0) with fuel inventory containing coal
- Furnace at position (5, 5) with no ingredients to smelt

### Lab at position(5, 5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab at position (5, 5) with no power and currently researching automation

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using incorrect entity types
- Ensure that when using functions like `insert_item`, the second argument is an Entity or EntityGroup, not a Position. Verify the type of the argument before calling the function.

### Errors when attempting to insert items without sufficient inventory
- Always check your inventory to ensure you have the required items before attempting to insert them into entities. In this case, ensure you have coal in your inventory before trying to insert it into the furnace.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities in the intended placement area.
